00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 // Function: MCAPIHighlighter()
00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 MCAPIHighlighter::MCAPIHighlighter(QTextDocument* parent) : QSyntaxHighlighter(parent),
00046                                                             m_highlightRules(),
00047                                                             m_commentStartExp("/\\*"),
00048                                                             m_commentEndExp("\\*/")
00049 {
00050     for (int i = 0; i < STYLE_COUNT; ++i)
00051     {
00052         setStyle(static_cast<StyleType>(i), DEFAULT_STYLES[i]);
00053     }
00054 
00055     // Apply the styles.
00056     applyStyles();
00057 }

00066 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 // Function: setStyle()
00068 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 void MCAPIHighlighter::setStyle(StyleType type, HighlightStyleDesc const& styleDesc)
00070 {
00071     Q_ASSERT(type < STYLE_COUNT);
00072 
00073     if (styleDesc.bold)
00074     {
00075         m_styleFormats[type].setFontWeight(QFont::Bold);
00076     }
00077     else
00078     {
00079         m_styleFormats[type].setFontWeight(QFont::Normal);
00080     }
00081 
00082     m_styleFormats[type].setFontItalic(styleDesc.italic);
00083     m_styleFormats[type].setForeground(QBrush(styleDesc.color));
00084 }

00086 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 // Function: highlightBlock()
00088 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 void MCAPIHighlighter::highlightBlock(QString const& text)
00090 {
00091     foreach (HighlightRule const& rule, m_highlightRules)
00092     {
00093         QRegExp expression(rule.pattern);
00094         int index = expression.indexIn(text);
00095 
00096         while (index >= 0)
00097         {
00098             int length = expression.matchedLength();
00099             setFormat(index, length, rule.format);
00100             index = expression.indexIn(text, index + length);
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     setCurrentBlockState(0);
00105 
00106     int startIndex = 0;
00107 
00108     if (previousBlockState() != 1)
00109     {
00110         startIndex = m_commentStartExp.indexIn(text);
00111     }
00112 
00113     while (startIndex >= 0)
00114     {
00115         int endIndex = m_commentEndExp.indexIn(text, startIndex);
00116         int commentLength;
00117 
00118         if (endIndex == -1)
00119         {
00120             setCurrentBlockState(1);
00121             commentLength = text.length() - startIndex;
00122         }
00123         else
00124         {
00125             commentLength = endIndex - startIndex + m_commentEndExp.matchedLength();
00126         }
00127 
00128         setFormat(startIndex, commentLength, m_styleFormats[STYLE_MULTI_LINE_COMMENT]);
00129         startIndex = m_commentStartExp.indexIn(text, startIndex + commentLength);
00130     }
00131 }

00133 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00134 // Function: applyStyles()
00135 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 void  MCAPIHighlighter::applyStyles()
00137 {
00138     m_highlightRules.clear();
00139 
00140     applyMCAPIStyle();
00141     applyCStyle();
00142 
00143     rehighlight();
00144 }

00146 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 // Function: applyCStyle()
00148 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 void MCAPIHighlighter::applyCStyle()
00150 {
00151     HighlightRule rule;
00152 
00153     rule.pattern = QRegExp("^#include <.*>");
00154     rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_STRING];
00155     m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00156 
00157     QStringList keywordPatterns;
00158     keywordPatterns << "\\bauto\\b" << "\\bbreak\\b" << "\\bcase\\b"
00159                     << "\\bchar\\b" << "\\bconst\\b" << "\\bcontinue\\b"
00160                     << "\\bdefault\\b" << "\\bdo\\b" << "\\bdouble\\b"
00161                     << "\\belse\\b" << "\\benum\\b" << "\\bextern\\b"
00162                     << "\\bfloat\\b" << "\\bfor\\b" << "\\bgoto\\b"
00163                     << "\\bif\\b" << "\\bint\\b" << "\\blong\\b" 
00164                     << "\\bregister\\b" << "\\breturn\\b" << "\\bshort\\b"
00165                     << "\\bsigned\\b" << "\\bsizeof\\b" << "\\bstatic\\b"
00166                     << "\\bstruct\\b" << "\\bswitch\\b" << "\\btypedef\\b"
00167                     << "\\bunion\\b" << "\\bunsigned\\b" << "\\bvoid\\b"
00168                     << "\\bvolatile\\b" << "\\bwhile\\b";
00169 
00170     foreach(const QString &pattern, keywordPatterns)
00171     {
00172         rule.pattern = QRegExp(pattern);
00173         rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_KEYWORD];
00174         m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00175     }
00176 
00177     QStringList preprocPatterns;
00178     preprocPatterns << "^#include\\b" << "^#ifndef\\b" << "^#ifdef\\b"
00179                     << "^#if\\b" << "^#endif\\b" << "^#pragma\\b";
00180 
00181     foreach(const QString &pattern, preprocPatterns)
00182     {
00183         rule.pattern = QRegExp(pattern);
00184         rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_PREPROCESSOR];
00185         m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00186     }
00187 
00188     rule.pattern = QRegExp("\"([^\"]|(\\\\\"))*\"");
00189     rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_STRING];
00190     m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00191 
00192     rule.pattern = QRegExp("\'([^\']|(\\\\\'))*\'");
00193     rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_STRING];
00194     m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00195 
00196     rule.pattern = QRegExp("//[^\n]*");
00197     rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_SINGLE_LINE_COMMENT];
00198     m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00199 }

00204 void MCAPIHighlighter::applyMCAPIStyle()
00205 {
00206     HighlightRule rule;
00207 
00208     QStringList mcapiTypePatterns;
00209     mcapiTypePatterns << "\\bmcapi_int_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_uint_t\\b"
00210         << "\\bmcapi_uint8_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_uint16_t\\b"
00211         << "\\bmcapi_uint32_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_uint64_t\\b"                    
00212         << "\\bmcapi_boolean_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_endpoint_t\\b"
00213         << "\\bmcapi_node_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_port_t\\b"
00214         << "\\bmcapi_version_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_status_t\\b"
00215         << "\\bmcapi_request_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_priority_t\\b"
00216         << "\\bmcapi_timeout_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_recv_hndl_t\\b"
00217         << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_send_hndl_t\\b" << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_recv_hndl_t\\b"
00218         << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_send_hndl_t\\b";
00219 
00220     foreach (QString const& pattern, mcapiTypePatterns)
00221     {
00222         rule.pattern = QRegExp(pattern);
00223         rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_MCAPI_TYPES];
00224         m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00225     }
00226 
00227     QStringList mcapiPatterns;
00228     mcapiPatterns << "\\bmcapi_initialize(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_finalize(?=\\()"
00229                   << "\\bmcapi_get_node_id(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_create_endpoint(?=\\()"
00230                   << "\\bmcapi_get_endpoint_i(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_get_endpoint(?=\\()"
00231                   << "\\bmcapi_delete_endpoint(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_get_endpoint_attribute(?=\\()"
00232                   << "\\bmcapi_set_endpoint_attribute(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_msg_send_i(?=\\()"
00233                   << "\\bmcapi_msg_send(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_msg_recv_i(?=\\()"
00234                   << "\\bmcapi_msg_recv(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_msg_available(?=\\()"
00235                   << "\\bmcapi_connect_pktchan_i(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_open_pktchan_recv_i(?=\\()"
00236                   << "\\bmcapi_open_pktchan_send_i(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_send_i(?=\\()"
00237                   << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_send(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_recv_i(?=\\()"
00238                   << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_recv(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_available(?=\\()"
00239                   << "\\bmcapi_pktchan_free(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_packetchan_recv_close_i(?=\\()"
00240                   << "\\bmcapi_packetchan_send_close_i(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_connect_sclchan_i(?=\\()"
00241                   << "\\bmcapi_open_sclchan_recv_i(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_open_sclchan_send_i(?=\\()"
00242                   << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_send_uint64(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_send_uint32(?=\\()"
00243                   << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_send_uint16(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_send_uint8(?=\\()"
00244                   << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_recv_uint64(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_recv_uint32(?=\\()"
00245                   << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_recv_uint16(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_recv_uint8(?=\\()"
00246                   << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_available(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_recv_close_i(?=\\()"
00247                   << "\\bmcapi_sclchan_send_close_i(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_test(?=\\()"
00248                   << "\\bmcapi_wait(?=\\()" << "\\bmcapi_wait_any(?=\\()"
00249                   << "\\bmcapi_cancel(?=\\()";
00250 
00251     foreach (const QString &pattern, mcapiPatterns)
00252     {
00253         rule.pattern = QRegExp(pattern);
00254         rule.format = m_styleFormats[STYLE_MCAPI_FUNCTIONS];
00255         m_highlightRules.append(rule);
00256     }
00257 }
